passages.name: Start
passages.text: You wake up in a dark room. There is a door to your left and a window to your right.

passages.name: Door
passages.text: The door is locked. You need a key to open it.

passages.name: Window
passages.text: You open the window and see a vast forest outside.

passages.name: Forest
passages.text: You climb through the window and find yourself in a dark, mysterious forest.

passages.name: End
passages.text: As you explore the forest, you realize this is just the beginning of your adventure...
